definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dig about (NH id., also surround, enclose; Aram. [[עִזְקְתָא]], 9ezqto0, 9ezaqto0 ring; Ar. 9azaqa cleave or furrow the earth with implement mii9zaqah;un; Eth. 9azaqt: well, cistern);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיְעַזְּקֵהוּ]] Is 5:2 (intens.) and he dug it carefully about.
